name: Such Is Lives
description:
You have died and been sent to the afterlife.

Due to your actions as a human, you have been sentenced to eternal reincarnation...as things that die easily.

It's always just a matter of time before you perish and reincarnate again.

Gameplay

Such Is Lives is a minigame collection where in each minigame, you play as a specific animal.

These minigames range from cleaning up sloppily eaten kibble as a dog to trying to stay in the air as a bird!

And if you lose any of the minigames, you die. No questioning it, you're dead.

However, you may choose to reincarnate and play as a different creature, with an entirely new set of minigames. They're all equally as likely to kill you and hopefully equally as funny!

Though, you will wanna do well at these minigames. For each minigame you beat in one life, you get a little time boost during the next life. This may not seem like much, but remember, numbers add up.
